questions.question: What is the difference between an array and a linked list?
options: Arrays are dynamic, linked lists are static
Arrays use contiguous memory, linked lists use pointers
Linked lists have a fixed size, arrays do not
questions.answer: Arrays use contiguous memory, linked lists use pointers

Which scheduling algorithm is used in real-time operating systems?

What is the difference between TCP and UDP?
options: UDP is more reliable than TCP
TCP is connection-oriented, UDP is connectionless
questions.answer: TCP is connection-oriented, UDP is connectionless

What is the purpose of garbage collection in programming languages like Java?
options: To free memory allocated to unused objects
